title: minimize and exit buttons on top of my game?
body: So just recently I tried to get into a game, and for some reason the game was running on a client window and not some separate window..This caused the window of the game to have a bar on top and I was restricted to move my camera around. The bar on top of the window had a minimize and exit button on it. I tried to reconnect the game, but it would not let me in after i left the game. I am currently trying to reinstall again hoping it would work..

replies.body: Interesting, I've never heard of this randomly happening before. Have you tried hopping back into your **VIDEO** settings in-game to enable Full Screen mode?
